Create a New Expense Report

Action Report Date Location Purpose
Edit | Delete 10/21/15 Denver, CO Board Meeting
Edit | Delete 8/22/15 Cheyenne, WY Regional Meeting
Tips:

  • Review the Director Expense Report Policy
  • Recommended browsers:
    • Chrome or Safari on iPad
    • Chrome or Internet Explorer for Windows
    • Chrome for Mac
  • Set browser to accept cookies
  • Collect receipts before you begin a new expense report
  • Save progress frequently
